content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error message when trying to run a Python code that required the "arcgis" module. I executed multiple commands to install and update the "arcgis". I then executed shell commands to show and export the system path, and added the correct path to the "arcgis" module to the system path. Finally, I successfully executed a Python code to create a new web map and add a feature layer to it.
"""
